title: The ROCK By Starfrit Cookware
transcripts:
Foodies and home chefs alike are raving about the new The Rock cookware collection. With its patent pending shot peening surface treatment, the Rock is converting cooks across the country.
 
After a week I'm completely sold and have been humbled by how great such an affordable set of pots is! Absolutely nothing sticks, and it cleans with just warm water.... Simply amazing! The patent pending shot peening technology gives the Rocks surface a noticeable difference.
 
Tiny steel balls are projected against the surface of the pan. As they impact the metal, they create a dimpled texture on the surface much like the texture of an orange peel. These dimpled indentations are crucial as they create micro air pockets below the food, so food naturally sticks less.
 
Great for frying! I love the perfectly flat bottom on this skillet. It cooks so evenly! To me it is the equivalent of cooking with cast iron, only much easier to handle because it is not as heavy.
 
The shot peening process compacts and hardens the metal to a rock like finish. This new surface finish stands out for its extended durability, enhanced non-stick properties and improved corrosion resistance.
 
Dont get fooled by other speckled nonstick coatings! They are just paint. The Rock has a permanent surface treatment that will not wear off.
 
The Rock is 50% harder its tough enough to withstand high heat.
 
40% more abrasion resistant ... its scratch resistant enough to use metal utensils.
 
The Rocks non-stick release lasts, fried egg after fried egg, and cleans up with a quick wipe.
 
The Rocks heavy gauge forged construction gives you optimal heat distribution with no hot spots and no warping so your pan will last and last.

And, the Rock is oven safe up to broil.

High performance, low maintenance cookware thanks to The Rock. Non-stick reinvented
